message.raw:
Added truncation decorator for ramp functions. Allows a truncation kwarg to be
passed to decorated ramp functions, whose effect is to keep the same functional
form of the ramp, but truncate the duration by a fraction between 0 and 1.
This works by modifying the end_time of the instruction generated by the ramp,
prior to sampling. One issue with this implementation is that the collision
detection of ramps in add_instruction uses the end_time of the full ramp, which
cannot be readily circumvented.
